volunteer.name: Cientifico Latino
volunteer.summary: Working as a member of the GSMI program to help increase the pool of minority scientists and professionals

volunteer.name: Fatima Fellowship

volunteer.name: University of Rochester
volunteer.summary: As a grad representative, I served as a bridge between the students and faculties of the department and advocated for the needs of graduate students.

awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'
